body.raw:
{
    "customerBookingId": 901, // required; integer, id of booking related to the payment
    "amount": 10, // required; number
    "dateTime": "2023-09-05 15:00:00", // string in date time format of 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss' ; the date time when the payment was made or will be made (right now for online payment methods, booking date for on-site payments)
    "status": "paid", // required; string; status of payment; possible values: 'paid', 'pending', 'partiallyPaid', 'refunded'
    "gateway": "stripe", // string, payment gateway; possible values:  'onSite', 'payPal', 'stripe', 'wc', 'mollie', 'razorpay'
    "gatewayTitle": null, // string; gateway title used with woocommerce (stripe, cash on delivery, bank transfer...)
    "data": null,  // json
    "packageCustomerId": null,
    "entity": "appointment", // string; payment type; possible values: appointment, event, package
    "actionsCompleted": 1, // boolean, 1/0; whether post-booking actions (sending emails, google calendar, zoom etc.) were completed
    "wcOrderId": null,  // integer; woocommerce order id
    "transactionId": null // string; online transaction id; used for refund option; transaction id of payments other than woocommerce
}
